attributes.action: Revoke all export licence of riot gears to the Hong Kong Police Force
attributes.additional_details: Many of these equipment are supplied by the UK, including tear gas, plastic bullets, and shield used by officers. I urge the UK government to revoke all export licence of riot gears to the Hong Kong Police Force
attributes.background: On 12th June 2019, the Hong Kong Police Force responded with excessive force to an otherwise peaceful demonstration. The police shot rubber/plastic bullet on retreating and unarmed protestors, used tear gas and pepper spray on journalists from around the world.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we are not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. The action you are calling for appears to have already happened.

The UK Government has said it will not issue further export licences for crowd control equipment to Hong Kong:

https://hansard.parliament.uk/Commons/2019-06-25/debates/C6193E30-6969-4C82-9115-FB70927ED559/HongKong

It has also said that there are no current export licences for crowd control equipment to Hong Kong:

https://www.parliament.uk/business/publications/written-questions-answers-statements/written-question/Commons/2019-06-26/269699/

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/233895
